original: CARLSSON, Anders Severin, Disponent, Örebro, f Morup, Hall, 18/5 90 av Carl Johan C o Severina Andersson, gm Hedvig Pettersson. Kroks hdlsinst Hbg, Vår gård. Charkuteri-elev Hbg 07—09, anst chark.aff Gbg 09—14, förest Klavreströms koop chark.frn 14—17, d:o Ankarsrums koop slakt.frn 17—21, disp Mä-larprov andelsslakt.frn Upps 21—22, ch Kon- sums chark.avd öbr 22—36, disp öbr läns slakt.frn sed. 36. V. ordf öbr hälsov.nmd. 0 CARLS SON, Arvid, Disponent, Ydrefors, f Oppeby, Ögl, 10/4 93. Tekn skogs- o sågvks-sk Härnösand. Anst trävarubransch 07, förv o skogsch Brovalla såg Ydrefors 19, arrend dna o skogsegend 28, ag dsa sed. 31, driv Hudda ångsåg Tidersrum, gr Björkfors Träförädlings AB Linkp 39. Kyrkov, kass kyrkoråd, v. ordf sk.styr, ordf komm.flm, tax.nmd o pens.nmd. Styr.led Skandinavbkns Vimmer-bykont, Tidersrums o Svinhults erk sjukkassa, styr.suppl S Sv träexp.frn; kass Ydrefors miss.frn. Länsnykterhetsnm ds-omb.
translated:
CARLSSON, Anders Severin, Manager, Örebro, b. Morup, Hall, 18/5 1890, to Carl Johan C and Severina Andersson, m. Hedvig Pettersson. Business Studies in Helsingborg, Our Farm. Apprentice in a delicatessen in Helsingborg from 1907 to 1909, employed at a delicatessen shop in Gothenburg from 1909 to 1914, manager at Klavreström cooperative's delicatessen from 1914 to 1917, the same position at Ankarsrum cooperative slaughterhouse from 1917 to 1921, manager at Mälarprov cooperative slaughterhouse in Uppsala from 1921 to 1922, chief of the Consumer's Cooperative's delicatessen department in Örebro from 1922 to 1936, manager of Örebro County's slaughterhouse since 1936. Vice chairman of Örebro Health Board. 

CARL'S SON, Arvid, Manager, Ydrefors, b. Oppeby, Ögl, 10/4 1893. Technical School for Forestry and Sawmills in Härnösand. Employed in the timber industry from 1907, administrator and forester at Brovalla sawmill in Ydrefors from 1919, leasing of farms and forests from 1928, agricultural director since 1931, owner of Hudda steam sawmill in Tidersrum, founder of Björkfors Timber Processing AB in Linköping in 1939. Churchwarden, treasurer of the church council, vice chairman of the school board, chairman of the municipal council, tax board, and pension board. Board member of Skandinavbank's Vimmerby branch, Tidersrum and Svinhult recognized health insurance fund, substitute board member of the South Swedish Timber Export Association; treasurer of Ydrefors Missionary Society. County Temperance Movement district representative.

education.school: Technical School for Forestry and Sawmills in Härnösand

employmentHistory.employer: Consumer's Cooperative's delicatessen department in Örebro
